meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jody Carlson John Leavy George McAleese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6595.

td.p: Jody Carlson, a paralegal from Fairfax, Virginia
John Leavy, a programmer from Austin, Texas
George McAleese, a political researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,201)

tr.td: I HAVE ISSUES
ABBREV. TV
AIRLINES
EUROPEAN LIT
ELEMENTS IN THE HUMAN BODY
SOUNDS LIKE A CLASSIC ARCADE GAME
